title: 1955 Western - Yellowneck - American Civil War film directed by R. John Hugh

sources.title: 1955 Western - Yellowneck - American Civil War film directed by R. John Hugh
sources.description:
A sergeant (Lin McCarthy), a colonel (Stephen Courtleigh), a thief (Berry Kroeger) and two other Rebel deserters trek toward Cuba through the Everglades.

Original title: Yellowneck (1955)

Director: R. John Hugh
Writers: R. John Hugh, John Klorer

Main cast:
Lin McCarthy - The Sergeant
Stephen Courtleigh - The Colonel
Berry Kroeger - Plunkett
Harold Gordon - Cockney
Bill Mason - The Kid
Al Tamez - Seminole
Jose Billie - Dead body
Roy Nash Osceola - Seminole

Genres: Adventure, Drama
Release date: August 21, 1955
Filming location: Everglades, Florida, USA
